title: Riverside Geyer erupts on a sunny summer day, with a rainbow
description: Riverside Geyer erupts on a sunny summer day, with a rainbow
author: m01229
generated_description: A spectacular geyser eruption sends a tall column of water and steam into the bright blue sky. A beautiful rainbow forms in the mist created by the powerful natural fountain. The thermal feature demonstrates the incredible geothermal forces at work beneath the surface in this volcanic landscape.
